languages.text: За распространение порочащих сплетен на дом Зауэрбэк наложен строгий штраф.
For spreading defamatory gossip, a severe fine was imposed on the House Sauerback.
languages.original_text: За распространение порочащих сплетен на дом Зауэрбэк наложен строгий штраф.

traits.locale_text: For spreading defamatory gossip, a severe fine was imposed on the House Sauerback.

languages.text: Wegen Verbreitung verleumderischer Gerüchte wurde das Haus Sauerback mit einer empfindlichen Strafe belegt.
languages.original_text: For spreading defamatory gossip, a severe fine was imposed on the House Sauerback.

traits.locale_text: Wegen Verbreitung verleumderischer Gerüchte wurde das Haus Sauerback mit einer empfindlichen Strafe belegt.

languages.text: 苏尔贝克家族由于散布诽谤性的流言蜚语而被处以重罚。
languages.original_text: For spreading defamatory gossip, a severe fine was imposed on the House Sauerback.

traits.locale_text: 苏尔贝克家族由于散布诽谤性的流言蜚语而被处以重罚。

languages.text: Por propagar rumores difamantes, se ha impuesto una grave multa a la casa Sauerback.
languages.original_text: For spreading defamatory gossip, a severe fine was imposed on the House Sauerback.

traits.locale_text: Por propagar rumores difamantes, se ha impuesto una grave multa a la casa Sauerback.

languages.text: 誹謗中傷に関わる噂を広めたとして、ザウアーバック家には厳しい罰金が課された。
languages.original_text: For spreading defamatory gossip, a severe fine was imposed on the House Sauerback.

traits.locale_text: 誹謗中傷に関わる噂を広めたとして、ザウアーバック家には厳しい罰金が課された。

languages.text: Pour avoir répandu des ragots diffamatoires, la maison Sauerback s'est vue infliger une sévère amende.
languages.original_text: For spreading defamatory gossip, a severe fine was imposed on the House Sauerback.

traits.locale_text: Pour avoir répandu des ragots diffamatoires, la maison Sauerback s'est vue infliger une sévère amende.

languages.text: Karalayıcı söylentiler yaydığı için Sauerback Hanesi ağır para cezasına çarptırıldı.
languages.original_text: For spreading defamatory gossip, a severe fine was imposed on the House Sauerback.
